channel.title: [D&D 5th Edition] wikidot, Link not working (Greater Invisibility)
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "[D&D 5th Edition] wikidot, Link not working (Greater Invisibility)" - Found an URL typo on the Armorer page

item.title: Re: [D&D 5th Edition] wikidot, Link not working (Greater Invisibility)
[D&D 5th Edition] wikidot, Link not working (Greater Invisibility)
item.content:encoded:
Hi,
I found a typo in one of the links on the page of the Armorer subclass for Artificers.

The 13th level spell Greater Invisibility is misspelled as "Invisibilty" with a missing "i", and also leads to a link that isn't working because it's also missing an "i" in the URL

Thanks!
